item.title: Remove AppValley Configuration Profile from iPhone (iOS)
item.description: For users who downloaded AppValley’s un-revokable Configuration Profile, and are concerned about their privacy - this is how to remove it. Download and install the following profile: appvalley.mobileconfig Once installed you, go to the following in settings General -> Device Management -> appvalley Then press Remove Profile. There will be a follow-up post on the mechanism behind this.
